titleStmt.title: The deep sighes and sad complaints of some late souldiers in Captain Needhams troop, in Colonel Hackers regiment, for wanting of justice and judgement. To our brethren and fellow-bondslaves, who as yet are compelled to gather straw, and make up your taile of brick, and hath no ease nor abatement in your burdens, we do complain.
titleStmt.author: Fothergill, Thomas, fl. 1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
